forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow diminishing this morning. Partial clearing this afternoon. High near 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers this morning. Partial clearing this afternoon. High 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 29F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 42F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low -2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low around 30F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 3C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 40F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 30F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 44F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers late. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers late. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 3C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low -1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 32F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of wintry precipitation in the evening. Then periods of snow expected later at night. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening, becoming all snow overnight. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening light rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening light rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
